Name: invexample
Description: You LOOKed at the inv example.
InSceneDescription: You see an 'invexample' propped up against the pure, white nothing of this scene. This description is only used by INVENTORY objects and appears in a scene before being picked up.

Interactions.Description: You punched the inv example. You feel really bad about it.
You licked the inv example. It doesn't taste very good.
By simultaneously dining on the two objects, the inv example disappearing into your belly, you summoned a world-ending 'craftedexample'. Why does it say 'do not eat in ANY circumstance'?
You picked up the inv example. It's kind of squishy.
You took a selfie with the inv example.
You did a thing to the static example using the inv example and... you disappeared!
